page.title: 19RECREATION SQUASH CLUB
page.content: The Rodmersham Squash Club was founded in 1966 and is situated in the south west corner of Rodmersham Green. The Club is in the countryside near Oakwood Farm, next to Rodmersham Hockey and Cricket Club. The Club consists of six courts, two licensed bars, the childrens room and seperate changing rooms for both men and women. It contains a gallery from which it is possible for spectators to watch the games. The Club has facilities for racket hire and repair.Tournaments called Squash Ladders are organised within the Club, where players are matched against those considered better than themselves. Winners are promoted up the ladder and losers move down. The Club also plays against other clubs in local leagues. The club steward lives with his family in a house provided by the Club.
